He served as an independent member of the Australian Senate, from 1975 to 2005.Grattan, Michelle: "Harradine and the political power of one", The Age, 30 June 2004. He represented the state of Tasmania. He was the longest-serving independent federal politician in Australian history and a Father of the Senate.
